com.facebook.litho.testing.sections

Class SectionsTestHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.litho.sections.SectionLifecycle
      • com.facebook.litho.sections.Section
        • com.facebook.litho.testing.sections.SectionsTestHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Equivalence<Section>, EventDispatcher, EventTriggerTarget, HasEventDispatcher, HasEventTrigger, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class SectionsTestHelper
extends Section
    A helper for testing section components.

    Allows testing a GroupsSectionSpec's direct children without building the whole hieararchy. Also allows simpler State updates testing by keeping trach of a scoped section context.

    • Method Detail

      • isEquivalentTo

        public boolean isEquivalentTo(Section other)
        Description copied from class: Section
        Compares this section to a different one to check if they are the same

        This is used to be able to skip rendering a section again. We avoid using the Object.equals(Object) so we can optimize the code better over time since we don't have to adhere to the contract required for a equals method.

        Specified by:
        isEquivalentTo in interface Equivalence<Section>
        Overrides:
        isEquivalentTo in class Section
        Parameters:
        other - the component to compare to
        Returns:
        true if the components are of the same type and have the same props

      • getContext

        public SectionContext getContext()
        Return a generic SectionContext you can use to create sections.

      • getScopedContext

        public SectionContext getScopedContext(Section s)
        Return the specific SectionContext that's been scoped to the given section.

      • prepare

        public Section prepare(Section s)
        Prepare section for testing.

        Prepare sets up a proper scoped SectionContext we can use to test lifecycle methods and state updates. It also prepares the given section for use by calling lifecycle methods like onCreateInitialState.

      • getChildren

        public java.util.List<SubSection> getChildren(Section section)
        Get child sections for the given section.
        Parameters:
        section - The section under test.
        Returns:
        A list of the children created by the given section.

      • getSubSections

        public static java.util.List<SubSection> getSubSections(Children children)
        Get sub sections for the given Children. This is very similar to getChildren(Section) except it gets the Children intead of calling createChildren. This is useful for testing the output of RenderSectionEvent handlers.
        Parameters:
        children - The Children object to extract sections from.
        Returns:
        A list of the sections inside the given Children object.

      • getStateContainer

        public <T extends StateContainer> T getStateContainer(Section section)
        Get the state container of the given section.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The section's StateContainer class
        Parameters:
        section - The section for which you want the state values from.
        Returns:
        the state container.

        public static java.lang.Object dispatchEvent(HasEventDispatcher section,
                                             EventHandler eventHandler,
                                             java.lang.Object event)
        Dispatches an event to the section
        Parameters:
        section - the section under test
        eventHandler - the event handler to execute
        event - the event object
        Returns:
        the event's return value if the event expects to return anything. Otherwise null.
